summary: Earlier this year, I lost the ability to use a keyboard and mouse for extended periods.  Fortunately, this wasn't as catastrophic as it sounds.  This article chronicles my experience using adaptive tools like dictation and eye-tracking as my primary mechanisms for writing code
title: Hands-Free Coding

summary:

Bah humbug
